name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Anthony JACOBS, Appellant

casebody.head_matter:
441 A.2d 1214
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Anthony JACOBS, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Jan. 18, 1982.
Decided March 10, 1982.
William A. Fitzpatrick, Philadelphia, (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Alan Sacks, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
